attributes.long-description:
Defend your homebase against threatening monsters by building towers and casting lightning storms across the forest. The game features a new island with more than 10 stages, new enemies, music tracks and special bonus features. With two new unique towers available, players can enjoy all the original Monster stages with fresh new gameplay.

Key Features:
- Content Galore - Includes the original PixelJunk™ Monsters and PixelJunk™ Monsters Encore
- Co-Op Play - Available with two PSP® systems locally and online via Ad Hoc & Infrastructure modes.
- New Towers & Enemies - Includes two new towers, brand new enemy & special boss
- Medal Challenge - Get rewarded with Medals and unlock bonus content such as videos, artwork and more

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item’s use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

Memory Stick Duo™may be required.

*Certain limitations apply to Wi-Fi connectivity. See manual for details.
Player responsible for Wi-Fi fees.
attributes.name: PixelJunk™ Monsters Deluxe
